meanings.definition: Venturis: plural noun, a device used to measure the flow of a fluid by creating a pressure difference

meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on venturis to calculate the speed of air in a wind tunnel.
meanings.sent3: At the science fair, the venturis were the talk of the town!

meanings.sent5: The venturis hummed softly as they revealed the secrets of fluid dynamics.
